title: ProTaper Team Stem polishes your cockpit w/ 31.8mm clamp and 30-50mm reach
content:
ProTaper have polished up a 31.8mm Team mountain bike stem, an item that will no doubt add a touch of class to most cockpits. It joins a lineup of racing-oriented carbon and aluminium handlebars, stems and grips for XC, Enduro and DH applications, from the Hayes Bicycle owned-brand. ProTaper Team Polished Stem Originally known as [â€¦]

author: Jessie-May Morgan
